content: Hello everyone, I am a beginner in FHIR and I would like to know if there are ways or hints about converting FHIR to relational database ?
I thought this talk on the subject was pretty good (from last year's devdays): https://www.devdays.com/videos/storage-and-analytics/
Or this one which covered the microsoft impl's relational schema (which is similar to ours and others IMHO): https://www.devdays.com/videos/how-to-add-a-fhir-api-to-an-existing-database/
You might also read through some of the discussion in the #storage for FHIR stream
